import React from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import UploadImage from '../ImageUploadForm' import axios from 'axios' function Timeline(){ const [uploadimage,setUploadImage] = React.useState(''); const [dataOnUser,setDataOnUser] = React.useState([]); const [userName,setUserName] = React.useState(''); React.useEffect(()=>{ const id = localStorage.getItem('email'); axios.post('http://localhost:8887/home/getpost',{'email':id}) .then(res=>{ setDataOnUser(res.data); console.log(res.data); }) }) React.useEffect(()=>{ const id = localStorage.getItem('email'); axios.post('http://localhost:8887/home/userdata',{'email':id}) .then(res=>{ console.log(res) setUserName(res.fname+res.lname); }) },[]) function convert(str) { var date = new Date(str), mnth = ("0" + (date.getMonth() + 1)).slice(-2), day = ("0" + date.getDate()).slice(-2); return [date.getFullYear(), mnth, day].join("-"); } function convertTime(str) { var date = new Date(str), hours = ("0" + (date.getHours())).slice(-2), minutes = ("0" + date.getMinutes()).slice(-2); return [hours, minutes].join(":"); } return(
uploadimage === false?setUploadImage(true):setUploadImage(false)}>Upload Post
{ uploadimage === true?( ):( null ) }
